pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoNaturals Honey Throat Lozenges 19 Drops in Resealable Bag
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoNaturals Naturally Flavoured Drops coats your dry and itchy throat with a great tasting balance of honey and menthol.

Coats dry and itchy throats.


Don't let an itchy throat ruin the moment.


Vicks VapoNaturals coats your dry and itchy throat with a great tasting balance of honey and menthol.


Unleash the power of your voice with Vicks VapoNaturals.




Suitable For: Dry and itchy throats

Product Claims: Coats dry and itchy throats

Boxed Contents: Approx. 19 Drops

Size: 70g (Approx. 19 Drops)

Serving Size: 3.65g (1 drop)

Servings Per Pack: 70g (Approx. 19 drops)

KEY FEATURES

• Coats dry and itchy throats
• Honey
• Naturally Flavoured Drops

Warnings

Not for children less than 2 years of age.

Ingredients

Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Honey, Natural Flavours, Acid (Citric Acid).

Contains: Pollen-bee

Directions

Store below 25°C. Keep in a cool dry place.
